attributes.action: scrap the toll on the humber bridge for the people of lincolnshire who need to go over the bridge for medical treatment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: currently people have to travel from Grimsby Scunthorpe and other parts of northern Lincs for treatment at castle hill hospital cottingham yorkshire for life threatening illnesses and other treatment not available locally. The toll of over 5 pounds return is effectively a tax on the sick. Public transport is woefully poor and inadequate. scrap this toll for hospital visitors now please

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "scrap the toll on the humber bridge for the people of lincolnshire who need to go over the bridge for medical treatment."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11281.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/humber-toll/
